title: I once had a guy on my team play Viktor jungle
body:
This was around the end of Season 4, maybe around worlds-ish time. Anyways so I get into a game a few of my friends, and like usually, I want jungle, but this guy says he's going jungle.

Alright, fine by me, pick order and all. Come his pick, this guy picks {{champion:112}}. Okay? We're a 4-man so he isn't trading. Is he gonna change last second? ***He locks it in.***

What happened next was *fucking* ***legendary.*** This guy built Feral Flare, on Viktor, in the jungle, building AP. This guy was an absolute monster. Best part? This guy was chill as fuck.

IIRC I'm pretty sure me and my friend bot lane weren't doing so bad. _This guy comes in, molests the enemy **fed **bot lane, and casually walks away like he isn't a registered sex offender now._

This guy, playing AP Viktor Feral Flare jungle proceeded to prance around the map destroying the enemy. I'm pretty at one point we win like a 3v5 because he was wrecking. And this wasn't a "the enemy is just really bad" thing, this guy was amazing.


Remember guys, just because someone picks something unconventional, doesn't mean it's bad. I've seen AP Udyr do good. I've seen AD Ahri do good. My friend and I used to do Soraka ADC w/ AP Jinx or Varus support, just because it was hilarious when the enemy thought I was the damage, when in fact, nobody expected the banana.

replies.body: I once had Kha'Zix jungler. He actually did really well, so people shouldn't be so quick to judge bad picks.
please this hurts my feelings.
I laugh
I really shouldn't be laughing, I legit feel a little bad that I lol'd
he is so much fun to play when you do well on him, but he almost can't outduel anyone :(

this is true :( specially tanks he literally cant touch them. been playing him a lot now and haveing lots of trouble. There will be some games but rarely where the other team has squishy people so i can get a few kills
Nobody expects the banana.

the thing is, back in s4 anyone could jungle

this season, even junglers can barely jungle

Meh, junglers can clear easily now. Exept maybe some assassins jungle that have a risky fist clear. Any melee with either sustain, shield or Fast clear can jungle.(Eck, even singed can jungle) For ranged, there is Kayle , Morgana, Malzahar and ryze for exemple. (and probably a few others)

>risky fist clear

uh...
{{champion:254}} has the riskiest fists in the league.
Shedding monkey tears right now. It hurts so much.

> [{quoted}](name=Best Scyther KR,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vR1HfYVK,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-05-09T22:22:54.450+0000)
> This guy comes in, molests the enemy **fed **bot lane, and casually walks away like he isn't a registered sex offender now.


I think that is one of the greatest lines I've ever read on these boards.
I second that
Because {{champion:112}} is that fucking awesome.

This is interesting because probably the cool look {{champion:112}} has it's probably a big part of the image he left on OP's mind.

Probably a {{champion:83}} wouldn't feel _so fresh_.

One game, I had a dou bot that locked in {{champion:412}} + {{champion:53}}.
So I locked in {{champion:25}} jungle, hoping for something amazing.
Top lane followed suit with {{champion:89}}.
Mid was looking iffy, but they picked {{champion:99}} mid.

All this without a word being spoken in blind pick normals.

What happened next, was legendary.

> All the flavors in the world and you choose to be salty

Brings tears to my eyes (Get it cuz tears are salty)
I THOUGHT I WAS THE ONLY MORG JUNGLE IN THE WORLD!!!!!!!!
just invade them, pick up their blue over the wall and type: "/all this is mine now"

"This guy comes in, molests the enemy **fed **bot lane, and casually walks away like he isn't a registered sex offender now."

"nobody expected the banana."

Its 12am and im laughing like an idiot. You made my day, sir. Long live Garen jg
I master the secret technique of Zyra jungle. But don't tell anyone....
Well it's easy, No one will spot her in the jungle. She is a plant.
{{champion:57}}
Are you sneaky?

He did single-handedly end an official league match before they found him.

1v10 no less.
I guess you could call that win an amazing {{champion:112}} y
WHY IS NOBODY COMMENTING ABOUT HOW FUNNY THIS IS
He's great, y'know, if you're trying to get good with every other support. Learn Bard and supporting becomes much easier. lol

Don't step to my Maokai support. 

However, by all means, feel free to step to my Ziggs support. But I want it so bad.

''This guy comes in, molests the enemy fed bot lane, and casually walks away like he isn't a registered sex offender''

Oh god this line made it for me, laughing too hard
Anecdotal!
you arent telling me how Viktor is good in the jungle. youre telling me how OP feral flare was.

> [{quoted}](name=ChaoticPinecone,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vR1HfYVK,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2015-05-10T01:37:44.551+0000)
>
> you arent telling me how Viktor is good in the jungle. youre telling me how OP feral flare was.

This wasn't during the days of broken Feral Flare. This was just before the jungle overhaul. When feral flare was subpar even on Master Yi.

No, but really you're telling me how one guy was a lot better than a bunch of other guys. Maybe the enemy team was shitty, maybe he was really good. Doesn't matter, it's a horrible pick and he would've won no matter what he picked probably.

> [{quoted}](name=Gavran,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vR1HfYVK,comment-id=000d00000000,timestamp=2015-05-10T03:57:44.229+0000)
>
> No, but really you're telling me how one guy was a lot better than a bunch of other guys. Maybe the enemy team was shitty, maybe he was really good. Doesn't matter, it's a horrible pick and he would've won no matter what he picked probably.
ADC Soraka was a real thing. The Banana is Real. The Banana is Life.

Except was this normals? ranked? what Q was it?

because heres what people need to consider when breaking the meta

1) is this ranked Q, never break the meta in ranked Q unless youve played 100+ won games that are unranked with that meta breaking role
2)will this meta break ruin my teams game for them: If its my first time maybe I should go play bots and experiment around with builds or look up guides
3)Will this make people be toxic in the game?: if its gunna make people toxic, dont do it. it isnt worth it
4) what league are you in?: bronze? meta breaks can work really well or fail really bad 50/50 shot because bronze is a melting pot of everything going good or bad, same with silver they just have the mechanics
Gold+? the meta is there for a reason if you want to climb you might wanna follow the meta

This post has got to be one of the greatest things I have ever read on the forums! For both the idea "don't judge people that take a champ "out of their lane"". Along with this sentence: _"This guy comes in, molests the enemy fed bot lane, and casually walks away like he isn't a registered sex offender now."_ Oh lord I am still laughing! Thank you for the greatest post of all time!

(****signs in at work just to up and comment****)
I give the benefit of doubt unless I'm sure it's dumb- like Kallista mid for example.
Kalista mid vs Zed/Yasuo mid. Nuff said.
Is it good or are you sharing Nightmare Experiences?

I heard Kalista.

Pretty sure it's a nightmare by default.
Nightmare, "I'm gonna lose fully half of my kit- but I'm breaking the meta!"
Then the bound jungle {{champion:157}}  jumps in from half a screen away

I have encountered a LOT of silly things too that just sort of... worked, for reasons I am unable to comprehend.

I've seen an ADC LeBlanc, by late game she was demolishing everything in her path with no possible escape due to LB's ridiculous mobility,
I've had a Riven support, whom SOMEHOW manage to get me fed as Ashe. Yes, she got ME fed, not herself, so she ACTUALLY DID A SUPPORT'S JOB, AND CORRECTLY TOO, all while remaining relevant throughout the game on a support's budget (I blame ACTUAL RIVEN SKILL, which is rare.)
I've also seen an Urgot. That guy was damn good.
